name: Coffee Craze
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 in 48 hrs!

Control coffee is your prime-time solution to keep yourself from going out of control. Though be aware, it is highly addictive, so much so that you cannot control yourself without it!

Fight and drink your way across the office to reach the secret resting at the top! Remember to stay hydrated.

Instructions

  • Collect all coffee to advance!
  • WASD to move
  • Left-click to melee
  • Right-click to throw your collected mugs
  • F to interact
  • R to restart

Made by Frepperino and wilzet
